title: teamfights/lategame fps drops .
body:
Hello, i have an overclocked fx 8350 cpu and a r9 390 gpu with 16 gb ram .
when the game starts, i have 120 + fps . during late game and teamfights , my fps drops to 40 , and even when not teamfighting with everyone on screen my fps is around 70 ish  .

i have no problem with 120, 70, or even 60 fps . 
what  i have  a problem with is the the fps not being constant . 
i can lower all setting to the very minimum and it changes absolutely nothing .
this isn't in every game, but when it appears it is debilitating for gameplay . 

is this an unfixable issue ? pros like imaqtpie have intel setups like a 4790k and a gtx 970 and in his streams he dips to roughly 80 fps , but his cpu is much faster than mine . the fact that he also drops to sub 100 fps makes me think this is an unfixable cpu bound issue hard coded into the game .

replies.body: There might be assets during these fights that are failing to render properly.  Usually the culprit is outdated drivers, but it could be something else!  Check out our [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide for a list of issues to help get this fixed up.  Hopefully, it'll be smooth sailing from there!
